list.name: Failed commit: Default
list.comment: ConnectionSettings improved (connect/disconnect layout, show connected device, disconnect button) Disconnector interface added disconnector added to service, it holds a BT socket and closes it when the connection is closed RCBuilder parses Views from file RCBuilder start ConnectionSettings if the service does not have a TransportManager Exit menu added
